html:
543 U.S. 1111

BELTRAN-HERNANDEZ
v.
UNITED STATES.

No. 04-6667.

Supreme Court of United States.

January 24, 2005.

1

C. A. 8th Cir. Reported below: 373 F. 3d 905; Motions of petitioners for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Certiorari granted, judgments vacated, and cases remanded for further consideration in light of United States v. Booker, ante, p. 220.
